resources.string: I-Android isebenzisa i-Motion Sense ukuze ithole ukunyakaza okuseduze. Ayisebenzisi ikhamera yakho, imakrofoni, noma indawo.
{DEVICE_TYPE,select, PHONE{Enza ngendlela oyifisayo i-Android yakho}TABLET{Enza ngendlela oyifisayo ithebhulethi yakho}other{Enza ngendlela oyifisayo idivayisi yakho}}
{DEVICE_TYPE,select, PHONE{Ungaqhubeka usebenzisa i-Android yakho}TABLET{Ungaqhubeka nokusebenzisa ithebulethi yakho}other{Ungaqhubeka nokusebenzisa idivayisi yakho}}
{DEVICE_TYPE,select, PHONE{Yenza okuningi nge-Android yakho}TABLET{Yenza okuningi ngethebhulethi yakho}other{Yenza okuningi ngedivayisi yakho}}
{DEVICE_TYPE,select, PHONE{{0}, yenza okuningi nge-Android yakho}TABLET{{0}, yenza okuningi ngethebhulethi yakho}other{{0}, yenza okuningi ngedivayisi yakho}}
I-Android isebenzisa i-Motion Sense ukuze ithole ukunyakaza okuseduze. Ayisebenzisi ikhamera yakho, imakrofoni, noma indawo.
